content: How do you feature Bitcoin in your Country?Miss El Salvador (Alejandra Guajardo) designed herself with gold bitcoin to appear in the Miss Universe Contest. She surprises everyone with that outfit in the contesting ground. All the Currencies Used in El Salvador were showcase in the Costume Design of the Miss El Salvador appearance. The following Currencies were seen in the costume Design of the Miss.Cacao beans, the colón, the U.S. dollar, and the Bitcoin symbol. Cacao had been a currency in El Salvador. The colón was also used in El Salvador since 1892 and it was replaced by the U.S. dollar in January 2001. The costume was colored with gold, silver, and bronze.Miss Universe El Salvador Walks the Stage Holding Giant Bitcoin StaffMiss El Salvador Features Bitcoin in Miss Universe 2023El Salvador Will Rise Again With Bitcoin
